short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Too lazy to click the skip button in Youtube? Too much effort clicking away popup ads? No worries, this extension does it for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A better Youtube experience while still supporting your favorite creators. Here's what this extension can do:

 - skip ads whenever the skip button becomes available
 - click away popup ads in the blink of an eye
 - mute video ads
 - avoid "are you still watching" popups
 - click "next video" rather than waiting for the timer
 - enable picture-in-picture
 - defer pausing until the ads have finished playing

All of these can be enabled and disabled. Check the YoutubePls icon in the toolbar for options.
